title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Assessment and Feedback Improvement Using Mobile Learning and Social Media

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool competency and comprehension of educational assessment theory
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design real-time feedback systems utilizing mobile devices and social media tools
